sentences.en: A cub is a small bear.
A cub is but not socially weaned for up to two years.
sentences.cn: 长到一年要断奶,然而这并非直到2年的舒适地断奶.

sentences.en: A Piper Cub was chartered to fly.
sentences.cn: 人们采用了派厄泼克勃型飞机飞行.

sentences.en: Berlin zoo employee Thomas Doerflein plays with polar bear cub Knut.
sentences.cn: 饲养员托马斯·多非恩在和克纳特在一起玩耍.

sentences.en: He had been a cub reporter for the Kansas City Star.
sentences.cn: 他曾是《堪萨斯城市星报》的一名年轻记者。

sentences.en: I used to belong to a den as a Cub Scout.
sentences.cn: 我曾作为一名童子军参加过幼年童子军队.

sentences.en: One morning when a vixen was taking her babies out of the lair, she saw a lioness and her cub.
sentences.cn: 一天清早,雌狐狸带着她的孩子走出巢穴, 看见了母狮子和她的孩子.

sentences.en: Students are playing ping - pong in high spirits at the cub now.
sentences.cn: 学生们现在正在俱乐部兴致勃勃地打乒乓球.

sentences.en: That sneering young cub got taken down a peg or two on that occasion.
sentences.cn: 当时那个傲气十足的黄毛小儿被我压了一压.

sentences.en: The cub licked the milk from its mother's breast.
sentences.cn: 这头幼兽吸吮着它妈妈的奶水.

sentences.en: The lion cub's mother was hunting for what she needs.
sentences.cn: 这只幼师的母亲正在捕猎.

sentences.en: The lip of that confounded cub, the second mate, quivered visibly.
sentences.cn: 二副, 那个惊慌失措的小伙子的嘴唇明显地哆嗦起来了.

sentences.en: Tom: [ bear cub away ] Good luck, little fella.
sentences.cn: 汤姆: ( 小熊走 ) 你好运, 小家伙.

sentences.en: Tom: [ shooing the bear cub away ] Good luck , fella.
sentences.cn: 汤姆: ( 赶小熊走) 祝运, 小家伙.

sentences.en: Tom: [ shooing the bear cub away ] Good luck, little fella.
sentences.cn: 汤姆: ( 赶小熊走 ) 祝你好运, 小家伙.

words.tran_cn: 幼兽；不懂规矩的年轻人

trans.tran_cn: 幼兽，崽，幼童军（成员/会议）
trans.tran_en: the baby of a wild animal such as a lion or a bear
